# 1 Load in tidyverse
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

# Load in the sample datasets
```{r}
athletes <- read_csv("/Users/ericseltzer/stat_289/esselt21/data/athletes.csv")
medals <- read_csv("/Users/ericseltzer/stat_289/esselt21/data/medals.csv")
```
```{r}
tidy_medals <- 
  medals %>%
  select(-athlete_short_name, -athlete_link, -country, -discipline)
tidy_athletes <- 
  athletes %>%
  select(-short_name, -country, - discipline, -url, )
```


```{r}
tidy_medals <-
  tidy_medals %>%
  rename(name = athlete_name) %>%
  mutate()
```

```{r}
new <-
  semi_join(tidy_medals,
            tidy_athletes,
            by = "name")
```

```{r}
new %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  summarise(count = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(count))
```
